channel.title: How can I make monsters drop?
channel.description: Hello, I was wondering on how to make monsters drop, in my npcdrops.java itdosent haveanything accept 2 things, and there not npcdrops, then i go to my cgf.folder and theres alot[br][size=1]Posted on: November 18, 2007, 05:18:57 PM[/size][hr]? :confused:

item.title: How can I make monsters drop?
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

add this in item2.java

[code]public static int 1[] = {itemid,itemid};

public static int random1()

[/code]
1=any name, keep same throught tho
ad this in npchandler.java

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == npcid) 
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.random1(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make monsters drop?
